quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
Women get the last word in every argument. Anything a man says after that is the beginning of a new argument.
Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot.
A woman has to live her life, or live to repent not having lived it.
A woman is like a tea bag - you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
I'd much rather be a woman than a man. Women can cry, they can wear cute clothes, and they're the first to be rescued off sinking ships.
In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits.
If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
Women do not find it difficult nowadays to behave like men, but they often find it extremely difficult to behave like gentlemen.
I am sick of women who love one. Women who hate one are much more interesting.
Women are made to be loved, not understood.
Women are never stronger than when they arm themselves with their weaknesses.
It's simple. Women only nag when they feel unappreciated.
If women were particular about men's characters, they would never get married at all.
I think today women are very scared to celebrate themselves, because then they just get labeled.
Women today have more of an overview of their lives and how marriage is or is not a part of it.
A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
Women desire six things: They want their husbands to be brave, wise, rich, generous, obedient to wife, and lively in bed.
A woman's guess is much more accurate than a man's certainty.
Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
Women are incredible in groups together. Terrifying. Men have nothing on them.
Women are naturally secretive, and they like to do their own secreting.
Women defend themselves by attacking, just as they attack by sudden and strange surrenders.
